CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Rice?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Rice is arc {Sugarcane}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Sugarcane?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Sugarcane is arc {Rice}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Rice to Wheat in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Wheat to Sugarcane in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Rice and Wheat in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rice and Wheat is {1108}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Sugarcane and Wheat in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Sugarcane and Wheat is {159}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow output from Sugarcane is {1452}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow input by Sugarcane is {1075}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 726? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1108} from {Wheat} to {Rice}, a flow of {778} from {Sugarcane} to {Wheat}, a flow of {916} from {Rice} to {Sugarcane}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 349? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {159} from {Wheat} to {Sugarcane}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 349 and 847? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {539} from {Rice} to {Wheat}, a flow of {778} from {Sugarcane} to {Wheat}, a flow of {674} from {Sugarcane} to {Rice}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Sugarcane to Wheat or from Wheat to Sugarcane?
NC.A: The flow from {Sugarcane} to {Wheat} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Rice to Wheat, from Wheat to Sugarcane, or from Sugarcane to Wheat?
NC.A: The flow from {Sugarcane} to {Wheat} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sugarcane}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Rice} and {Wheat}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Sugarcane, Arc Rice, Arc Wheat}.
